1234580.name: fullybroKEN - A Unique Mix of 4X / Post-Apocalypse / RPG / Roguelike
1234580.description:
High-octane action, a match-3 RPG like no other

  • Permadeath with challenging gameplay
  • Synergies, roguelike elements and making your own strategies during battles never felt so rewarding
  • Inspired by games like Slay the Spire, Puzzle Quest, Darkest Dungeon

Living, breathing world with NPC's minding their own business

  • Emergent narrative where you actions truly shape the world
  • Tons of role-playing and character creation possibilities as well as hard choices
  • See how the settlers are living their lives, during the best of times and the worst of times

Community-oriented game, updated regularly, developer open to new ideas and listens to feedback, credit for every major help you can provide in the game development


DO NOTE: As this is Early Access some features are still in development and bugs are to be expected. Thank you for your understanding.
1234580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
